name: Soul Hunt (xquentoux)
description:
Soul Hunt is a game where you control a demon who will try to survive by killing these zombies and eat their residue of soul.

You only need the arrow keys or wasd to move and the mouse to shoot.

The game was made for the  One Script Jam 2021  , so it was made with only one Script.

If the web version doesn't work you can still download the .zip file.
